identity.name: E1 Voice Agent Design System
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with organic voice warmth
Emotion First: Trust and clarity for business, magic for AI
Content is King: Data visualization (calendars/voice) drives the layout
Negative Space: Generous padding to reduce cognitive load

mono.usage: Code snippets, API keys, Technical logs

primary.description: Electric Violet - Use for Primary Actions, Voice Active State

secondary.description: Slate 100 - Use for Secondary Buttons, Card Backgrounds

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-11 px-8 rounded-full shadow-lg shadow-violet-500/20 transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-50 h-11 px-8 rounded-full transition-all

cards.base: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-slate-100 dark:border-slate-800 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 rounded-2xl p-6
cards.glass: bg-white/70 dark:bg-slate-900/70 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 shadow-xl

inputs.base: h-11 bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-500/20 focus:border-violet-500 rounded-lg transition-all

abstract_bg.usage: Voice Agent Interface Background / Hero Overlay

rules: Use data-testid for all interactive elements
Focus states must be visible (ring-2 ring-violet-500)
No pure transparent backgrounds under text

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Follow the 'Soft Utility' aesthetic. Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders. Implement the Bento Grid layout for the dashboard.
instructions_to_main_agent.theme_implementation: Use the 'colors' section to configure Tailwind. Ensure Dark Mode is supported but default to Light Mode for this business use case.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Use Shadcn UI components but override styles to match the 'radius' and 'shadows' defined here. Do not use default Shadcn cards; use the 'cards.base' style.
instructions_to_main_agent.voice_interface: The Voice Agent interface should use 'glassmorphism' and 'abstract_bg' to feel distinct from the rest of the admin dashboard.
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to every button, input, and link.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
